item.title: Jason add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "What's the world's greatest lie?... It's this: that at a certain point in our lives, we lose control of what's happening to us, and our lives become controlled by fate." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Jason add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "And this I believe: that the free, exploring mind of the individual human is the most valuable thing in the world. And this I would fight for: the freedom of the mind to take any direction it wishes, undirected. And this I must fight against: any idea, religion, or government which limits or destroys the individual. This is what I am and what I am about." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Jason add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Throughout the centuries there were men who took first steps, down new roads, armed with nothing but their own vision." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Jason add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "What makes the desert beautiful,' said the little prince, 'is that somewhere it hides a well..." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
